snippet: The freely revving racecar campaigned in 2012 by Aim Autosport Team FXDD was on view outside of 7 World Trade Center on Tuesday morning.
abstract: The freely revving racecar campaigned in 2012 by Aim Autosport Team FXDD was on view outside of 7 World Trade Center on Tuesday morning.

headline.main: From a Grand-Am Ferrari 458, a Stirring Wake-Up Call in Lower Manhattan
